sentences.english: Nothing was heard in the room but the hurrying pen of the stripling.
sentences.chinese: 屋子裏悄然無聲，只有年輕人的筆匆忙劃過紙頁。

sentences.english: Forget it because these guys are usually in a rush.
sentences.chinese: 還是算了吧，這些傢伙通常匆匆忙忙。

sentences.english: Be sure there’s spaces between things, so you’re not rushed.
sentences.chinese: 要確保每件事之間都留有餘地，這樣你就不會太匆忙。

sentences.english: Quickly take a picture with DC then hurry back to the warm cart.
sentences.chinese: 匆忙用數碼相機拍了張照片就鑽回了溫暖的車廂裏。

sentences.english: Her week-day clothes had been tossed here and there in her haste.
sentences.chinese: 匆忙中，她把平日穿的衣服扔得到處都是。

sentences.english: He hurried across the river to Hanyang.
Escape to find Zach, Zach saw him in a hurry to run away.
sentences.chinese: 逃走的季諾夫找到扎克，扎克見到他後匆忙跑開。

sentences.english: She hurried back to their home with her precious son.
sentences.chinese: 她匆匆忙忙地把她的寶貝兒子帶回家。

sentences.english: I was in a hurry and got on the wrong bus.
When the police arrived , the robbers had scrambled out of the windows.
sentences.chinese: 當警察到達時，強盜們匆忙從窗口逃脫。

sentences.english: I ran my head into the lamppost and hurt it.
sentences.chinese: 匆忙之中，他的頭撞到了一根電燈杆上。

sentences.english: Hurry, let it maintained between the years of friendship becomes weak.
sentences.chinese: 匆忙之間，讓這維持了多年的友誼變淡。

sentences.english: Chippy Hackee went home in a hurry!
sentences.chinese: 東部花鼠奇比匆匆忙忙回家了。

sentences.english: It was impossible to hurry through the process of getting a driver's license.
sentences.chinese: 想匆忙趕完得到駕駛執照的過程是不可能的。

sentences.english: She forded the river in a hurry.
sentences.chinese: 她匆匆忙忙涉水過了河。

sentences.english: The woman became aware of footsteps hurrying after her.
sentences.chinese: 那位婦女覺察到身後有匆忙的腳步聲。

definition: there's not enough time (to do sth)/it's too late (to do sth)
to act with confusion/to be in a flurry/to be flustered
there's still time/able to do sth in time
